name: AWS Certified AI Practitioner (AIF-C01) Practice Exam Questions

questions.question: A startup is developing a predictive analytics solution for customer churn. During a technical webinar hosted by Jim Tyler (@PowerShellEngineer), the team learns about different machine learning approaches. Which type of machine learning would be MOST appropriate for predicting which customers are likely to cancel their subscription?

A retail company is analyzing customer purchase data to identify natural groupings of similar shopping behaviors. They have no predefined categories and want the algorithm to discover patterns on its own. Which machine learning approach should they use?
A healthcare provider wants to implement an AI solution that can detect abnormalities in medical images. Which AWS service would be MOST appropriate for this specific use case?
A financial services company needs to extract data from different types of forms and documents submitted by customers. Which AWS service should they use to automate this process?
A marketing team needs to analyze customer feedback from social media in multiple languages to identify sentiment trends. Which AWS service would be MOST efficient for this task?
A content creation company wants to generate lifelike speech from text content in multiple languages for their tutorial videos. Which AWS service should they use?

A software development company wants to implement an AI-powered assistant that can help with code generation, explain code snippets, and answer programming questions. Which AWS service is BEST suited for this requirement?

A gaming company wants to build immersive NPCs (non-player characters) that can engage in natural conversations with players. Which AWS service would provide the foundation for this generative AI capability?

A financial services company is implementing an AI model to evaluate loan applications. To ensure fairness, they need to identify and mitigate potential biases in their training data. Which approach represents a BEST practice for addressing this concern?
options: Use only demographic data to train the model
Collect a smaller but more focused dataset
Use a black-box model to avoid potential biases
Perform bias detection and mitigation during model development

questions.question: A company is developing an AI system that will make significant business decisions. Which principle of responsible AI emphasizes the importance of being able to explain how decisions are made?
A customer service department wants to implement an intelligent chatbot that can handle common customer inquiries and perform actions like checking order status. Which AWS service should they use?

A manufacturing company wants to detect anomalies in their equipment using sensor data to predict potential failures before they occur. Which combination of AWS services would be MOST appropriate for this predictive maintenance solution?
options: Amazon Kinesis Data Streams, Amazon Lookout for Equipment, and Amazon QuickSight
Amazon S3, Amazon Textract, and Amazon Comprehend
Amazon Rekognition, AWS Lambda, and Amazon DynamoDB
Amazon Connect, Amazon Lex, and Amazon Polly

questions.question: A data scientist is preparing to build a machine learning model but is concerned about the quality of the training data. Which step in the machine learning process is MOST critical to address before model training?

A company has trained a machine learning model to predict customer churn. During evaluation, they observe that the model performs extremely well on the training data but poorly on new data. What issue is the model likely experiencing?
A retail company wants to implement personalized product recommendations for their e-commerce website. Which AWS service would be MOST suitable for this purpose?
A media company needs to automatically tag and categorize a large archive of images for easier search and retrieval. Which AWS service should they use?
A marketing team wants to create multiple variations of product descriptions without writing each one manually. Which AWS service would best support this generative AI use case?

A logistics company wants to improve their delivery time estimates by analyzing historical delivery data and external factors like weather and traffic. Which AWS service would be MOST appropriate for this time-series forecasting challenge?

A healthcare organization needs to implement an intelligent document processing system that can extract information from medical forms, understand medical terminology, and securely store patient data. Which combination of AWS services would be MOST appropriate?
options: Amazon Textract, Amazon Comprehend Medical, and Amazon S3 with encryption
Amazon Rekognition, Amazon Transcribe, and Amazon DynamoDB
Amazon Lookout for Vision, Amazon Polly, and Amazon RDS
Amazon Kendra, Amazon Lex, and Amazon EFS

questions.question: A company is planning to deploy an AI system that will process customer data. To address privacy concerns, which approach represents a BEST practice for responsible AI?
options: Collect as much customer data as possible to improve model accuracy
Apply data minimization principles and only collect necessary data
Store all data indefinitely for future model training
Share data freely across teams to maximize its utility
